slicer-tools-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
slicer-tools-errata.name: Slicer Tools
slicer-tools-errata.ability: After you execute a maneuver, you may exhaust this card to choose an enemy ship at distance 1-3. Look at the top command dial assigned to that ship. Then you may either choose a new command on its top command dial or that ship gains 1 raid token of your choice that does not match its top command dial. If the chosen ship has no top command dial, it gains 1 raid token of your choice.
